1 /* University of Genoa - Software Architecture for Robotics (2017/2018) */
2 /* Project: Teleoperation with MIRO - Mateus Sanches Moura, Suman Ghosh */
3 /* Gesture Processing service source code */
4 
5 /* Libraries */
6 #include "ros/ros.h"
7 #include "tf/tf.h"
8 #include "tf/transform_datatypes.h"
9 #include "miro_teleop/GestureProcessing.h"
10 #include <cmath>
11 
12 /* Service function */
13 bool findTarget(miro_teleop::GestureProcessing::Request &req,
14  miro_teleop::GestureProcessing::Response &res)
15 {
16  /* Obtain body position */
17  geometry_msgs::Point position = req.gesture.position;
18 
19  /* Initial orientation reference (assuming alignment with x axis) */
20  tf::Vector3 reference(1,0,0);
21 
22  /* Convert from quaternion to rotated vector representation */
23  tf::Quaternion rotation;
24  quaternionMsgToTF(req.gesture.orientation, rotation);
25  tf::Vector3 direction = tf::quatRotate(rotation, reference);
26 
27  ROS_INFO("Quaternion received: (%3.2f, %3.2f, %3.2f, %3.2f)",
28  req.gesture.orientation.x,
29  req.gesture.orientation.y,
30  req.gesture.orientation.z,
31  req.gesture.orientation.w);
32 
33  ROS_INFO("Position: (%3.2f, %3.2f, %3.2f)",
34  position.x, position.y, position.z);
35  ROS_INFO("Direction: (%3.2f, %3.2f, %3.2f)",
36  direction.x(), direction.y(), direction.z());
37 
38  /* Check whether user is pointing upwards */
39  if(direction.z() > 0)
40  {
41  ROS_INFO("Invalid gesture");
42  // TODO Invalid gesture, do something... ****
43  }
44  else
45  {
46  /* If not, find target position in the x-y plane */
47 
48  double a = -position.z/(direction.z());
49  res.target.x = position.x + a*(direction.x());
50  res.target.y = position.y + a*(direction.y());
51  res.target.theta = atan2(res.target.y-position.y,
52  res.target.x-position.x);
53 
54  // TODO Include boundaries conditions... ****
55  }
56 
57  ROS_INFO("Target found: (%f,%f)", res.target.x, res.target.y);
58 
59  return true;
60 }
61 
62 /* Main function */
63 int main(int argc, char **argv)
64 {
65  /* Initialize, assign a node handler and advertise service */
66  ros::init(argc, argv, "gesture_processing_server");
67  ros::NodeHandle n;
68  ros::ServiceServer service =
69  n.advertiseService("gesture_processing", findTarget);
70  ROS_INFO("Gesture processing service active");
71  ros::spin();
72 
73  return 0;
74 }
